name: EscarGO
description:
Be the fastest escargot in town! (In singleplayer or multiplayer) 

We currently only support a Windows Build since we save progression. We might add a webgl version later. If you would like a mac or linux build plrease let us now we will give our best to deliver them later. 

In case you find a bug or have a suggestion feel free to use our nolt page!

https://escargo.nolt.io/
